levels.description: ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>; stop attacking and focus on healing nearby allies, each heal giving the target a <$ba.barrier>Barrier</> that absorbs <@ba.vup>Arts</> damage equal to <@ba.vup>{attack@scale:0%}</> of Bassline's ATK
